column4: What are some of the first things you should do after a fresh install?
or at least the ones you like the best
start looking at all the programs for things you'll use every day and pick the best ones

i was thinking more along the lines of things like easy-ubuntu, automatix2.. i don't want to go installing everything under the sun. just the common stuff... like i know i need the w32codes and libdvdcss(sp?)
